TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LongValidator extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorBase

span.span: Provides validation of an value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用來確保`long`（64 位元帶正負號的整數） 符合特定準則。The is used to ensure a `long` (a 64-bit signed integer) meets specific criteria. 驗證的準則確立的執行個體建立類別。The criteria for validation is established when an instance of the class is created. 建構函式可確保`long`正在驗證的值符合最小值和最大長度。The constructor ensures that the `long` value that is being validated adheres to both a minimum and a maximum length. 建構函式會檢查的最小值和最大值值，以及驗證範圍是否獨佔。The constructor checks both the minimum and maximum values, as well as whether the validation range is exclusive. 建構函式會檢查先前的三個參數，並也檢查是否值等於特定解析度的值。The constructor checks the previous three parameters and also checks whether the value is equal to a specific resolution value. 方法會判斷要驗證的物件型別是否符合預期的類型。The method determines whether the object type being validated matches the expected type. 正在驗證的物件會傳遞做為參數的方法。The object being validated is passed as a parameter of the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用型別。The following code example demonstrates how to use the type. remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式可確保所驗證的長整數值符合最小值和最大長度。The constructor ensures that the long value being verified adheres to both a minimum and a maximum length.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當建構函式時，它會檢查的最小值和最大值值，以及驗證範圍是否獨佔。When the constructor is used, it checks both the minimum and maximum values, as well as whether the validation range is exclusive. 當`rangeIsExclusive`參數設定為`true`，則值之間不能`minValue`和`maxValue`。When the `rangeIsExclusive` parameter is set to `true`, the value must not be between `minValue` and `maxValue`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用建構函式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您指定`resolution`，則才能通過驗證，正在驗證的值必須是等於該值。When you specify the `resolution`, the value being validated must be equal to that value in order to pass validation.

span.span: The value of an object.

summary.span: 判斷物件的值是否有效。

span.span: Determines whether the value of an object is valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別包含所需的驗證規則物件。The class contains the rules necessary to validate an object. 執行個體時，會建立規則建立類別。The rules are established when an instance of the class is created. 要驗證的物件會傳遞做為參數的方法。The object to validate is passed as a parameter of the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
